> Is there an aspect of JunitPerf/Junit that allows for multiple test 
to be
> preformed when each individual test involves unique data?

There is a method which is independent of the tool you use.  You may 
be using a class variable to serve as the unique ID.  If so, try 
changing that to use a class method which asks for a unique id...  Do 
you see where I'm going?  E.g.

  private static int idSeed = 1000;
  public static int uniqueId() {
    return ++idSeed;
  }

There is a problem with this approach, but it is the same as you face 
with your current implementation.  If the idSeed variable is 
hardcoded (as in the example above), each time you rerun the tests, 
you will have had to make sure you removed the results from your last 
test run.  Resolving this problem will be left as an exercise to the 
reader.

Regards,

Manuel Amago.
